text.section: The Board shall act promptly on a claim made under this subtitle.

On receipt of a claim, the Board shall:
Forward a copy of the claim:
To each licensee alleged to be responsible for the act or omission giving rise to the claim;
To each unlicensed employee alleged to be responsible for the act or omission giving rise to the claim; and
To each funeral establishment that employs a licensee or unlicensed employee alleged to be responsible for the act or omission giving rise to the claim; and
Request from each of the persons listed in item (1) of this subsection a written response within 10 days to the allegations set forth in the claim.

section.section:
The Board:
Shall review the claim and any response to the claim; and
May conduct an investigation of the claim.

On the basis of its review and any investigation that the Board conducts, the Board shall:
Set the matter for a hearing; or
If the claim is frivolous, made in bad faith, or legally insufficient, dismiss the claim.

text.section: At any claim hearing, the burden of proof shall be on the claimant to establish the validity of the claim.
